snippet.title: Diary of Broken Dreams Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the alpha here: https://dreamchasergames.itch.io/diary-of-broken-dreams

Diary of Broken Dreams is a deeply personal psychological horror game about suicidal depression, childhood trauma, emotional abuse, and the fear of one's own emotions. It's about my very own mind. It's about my story. It's also a game about hope and healing though and a desire to cast off the chains of the past that keep us from moving forward with our lives.

Features:
- Immersive gameplay.
- Puzzles that are contextual and relevant to the story being told.
- Sound design and original music made by me.
- A unique nightmare-dreamlike visual style.
- A true story that exposes what living with suicidal depression and mental illness is like.

THIS GAME IS STILL IN EARLY ALPHA AND WAS MADE IN ONLY 30 DAYS TO BE SUBMITTED IN ITS CURRENT STATE FOR THE 'FINALLY FINISH SOMETHING' GAME JAM.

AS THIS GAME IS STILL IN EARLY ALPHA, THERE EXISTS SOME PLACEHOLDER CONTENT WHICH WILL BE IMPROVED OR REPLACED AS DEVELOPMENT CONTINUES.
